title: hara hara shambhO
sahitya:
hara hara shambhO shiva gurunAthA AtkoLLalAghAdA AtkoLLalAghAdA


anupallavi

  iravuDan paghalum muraiyiDum maghanin iru vinai mAravE aruL puriyAyO


caraNam    ajnAnam pOga Anavam sAga agham tanil irundE ughandadaip-purindE vijnAna
kanalAi viLangiDa nAnum vEda shaivam Oduginra sAdhanam kai kUDavE
